channel.title: Goudont V4 armour shop help
channel.description: Ok, so, I'm using the "goudont V4" server. And, when i go to the armour shop, the shop doesn't open. I'll click "click here to continue" and it just disappears, the shop won't open. I check to see if there was an armour shop in the shop file, and there wasn't. and i don't know how to fix it. Help?? [IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g477/totalystylin/help_zps26bc24a1.png[/img]

item.title: Goudont V4 armour shop help
item.dc:creator: @alexpwnz alexpwnz
item.description:
@alexpwnz wrote:

Ok, so, I’m using the “goudont V4” server. And, when i go to the armour shop, the shop doesn’t open. I’ll click “click here to continue” and it just disappears, the shop won’t open. I check to see if there was an armour shop in the shop file, and there wasn’t. and i don’t know how to fix it. Help??

Read full topic
